newsitem.title: USA: Waste Recovery to buy recycling firm.
newsitem.headline: Waste Recovery to buy recycling firm.

text.p: Waste Recovery Inc, a processor of scrap tires and producer of tire-derived fuel, said on Tuesday it has agreed to acquire the assets and business of U.S. Tire Recycling Partners LP for about $4 million in stock and convertible subordinated debt.
U.S. Tire Recycling collects and disposes of approximately six million tires annually from North Carolina, South Carolina and Virginia, as well as parts of Georgia and Tennessee, Waste Recovery said.
The deal is expected to be accretive to earnings and contribute significantly to cash flow, Waste Recovery said.
